emuInput.TitMainTitle: Dr. Gaylord P. Harnwell, Dr. Ralph J. Bunche, Dr. Edward H. Litchfield, and Dr. Charles B. Nutting wearing doctoral robes in Carnegie Music Hall, Oakland
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 9, 1957, pg. A2, reads: "Get Honorary Degrees -  Shown above are outstanding personalities who received honorary degrees from the University of Pittsburgh at commencement exercises last Friday.  Reading from left to right: Dr. Gaylord P. Harnwell, president, University of Pennsylvania, Doctorate of Laws; Dr. Ralph J. Bunche, United Nations Undersecretary, Doctorate of Civil Law; Dr. Edward H. Litchfield, chancellor of Pitt, and Dr. Charles B. Nutting, director of Buhl Foundation, Doctorate of Laws.  Dr. Bunche was the commencement speaker. - Harris Photo."
